Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: StoryPlotter Eos' Office

Vast pristine hills, stretching on as far as the eye can see, rivers flowing off in the distance to meet with great mist shrouded mountains. The Sun rises as if beckoned right between two peaks, its rays bathing everything is a golden glow

A simple office with whitewashed walls and a wooden floor. A series of windows line the outer walls. There is a door to the east. Your attention is instantly drawn to the mural upon the eastern wall. A sense of peace and beginning encompasses you.
A vast stretch of heavenly landscape
http://i213.photobucket.com/albums/cc100/sbguinness/eos.jpg
door
golden chariot

A two wheeled gilded battle cart, with a waist high shield bringing up the rear, acting as a gate. The chariot itself is decorated with two gleaming morning-stars and brushed with crimson and bronze paint. Heavily ornamented wheels with small spikes jutting from the hubs rest solidly beneath it. It is drawn by two immaculately white winged rams.
A golden chariot rests here, a pair of stout winged rams grazing nearby
steel four post bed

Luxuriant and capacious, this four post bed seems to have appeared from no where, longing comfortably in the grass. Four twelve foot steel posts reach into the sky. A massive swatch of semi-translucent silk drapes over the posts, rarely obscuring a vew of those upon it. The pure, snow white sheets lay disheveled across the bed, four overstuffed pillows haphazardly pressed up against the bed's ornate steel headboard. A sleek pair of obsidian handcuffs dangle from one of the posts and a long coil of silken rope drapes neatly over it,m gathering at the foot of the bed.
A large steel four post bed.
steel cage

Simple and clean, this cage contains a small pink heart-shaped pillow and a purple blanket. The Name "Eris" has been neatly emblazoned across a plate on the very top of the small door. A bowl of water sits neatly in one corner.
A steel cage
ornate ceiling

The ceiling of Eris' cage is ornately decorated tray ceiling. This style is noted for making a space look larger, deeply recessed and molded with delicately carved trim. The entirety is painted in painstaking detail, as if its been a labor of time, and love. Closer examination reveals a vast landscape.
an ornate cieling
the north east corner
The north east corner of the room.
The north east corner of the room.
the northwest corner
The northwest corner of the room.
The northwest corner of the room.
the southeast corner
The southeast corner of the room.
The southeast corner of the room.
the southwest corner
The southwest corner of the room.
The southwest corner of the room.
the corners
Still in a cage genius.
There are no corners....your in a cage
the black marbleized floor
The floor is polished to a high sheen, making it nearly reflective, however there are a multitude of bloodt footprints laid across it, in an almost elegant patten. Eris loves to dance.
The black marbleized floor.
the middle of the room
The middle of the room.
The middle of the room.
the free floating wall

The wall itself is composed of a stunning mural depicting a beautiful sunrise. The sun is breaking over the distant mountains, golden rays are cast over the landscape of valleys and mountains, forests and rivers. The gates to heaven is open and through it rides a chariot. This is the sunrise of Eos, Goddess of Dawn.

A wall standing alone, with no visible means of support. Upon the wall is set a door and two four-paned windows displaying a pristine ocean. The wall itself is composed of a stunning mural depicting a beautiful sunrise.
the northern wall
The whitewashed northern wall.
The whitewashed northern wall.
the southern wall
The whitewashed southern wall.
The whitewashed southern wall.
the western wall
The whitewashed western wall.
The whitewashed western wall.
the bars that encompass the ethereal cage

There are bars all around, heavily etched with protective wards and symbols, meant to keep Eris from wreaking havoc on the world outside. Additionally there is some profanity etched into the bars, likely Eris' contribution.
All encompassing wrap around bars, keeping Eris at bay...for now
chaotic blue portal
This gravity defying pool of blue fluid pulses and swirls discordantly in the space, shifting now and then from spot to spot.
shimmering pool of blue fluid

floating black window

The window has been marred with claws and fang, the glass long since busted out. Through it lies the mind of the twisted Goddess Eris. Focusing on the window too long, you realize yur opening staring into pure chaos and darkness and realize as you gaze into the abysmal landscape, and it gazes right back.
A floating black window, twisted and dull. Through it you see:
